message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's call it a 45/55 split.  This way, we both get something closer to our initial desired amount.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I think I can do better. This is my new offer.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a bit tired of this back and forth. Let's settle on a 40/60 split. It's not ideal, but it's better than nothing at this point.
